subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=정|eumhun=|rv=jeong|mr=chŏng|y=ceng}} <ref>The radical suggests an anchor made of wood.</ref>
[[Image:Kotwica SS Poznań.JPG|thumb|right| [[땅]]에 [[닿다|닿]]은 [[닻]] ([[anchor]])]]

# ([[닻]]): [[anchor]], perhaps especially made of wood.

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|碇}} (정, ''jeong'') <ref>The radical suggests an anchor made of stone.</ref>
* {{l|ko|錨}} (묘, ''myo'') <ref>The radical suggests an anchor made of iron.</ref>

subSections.title: Related terms
subSections.text:
* 木椗 ([[목정]], ''mokjeong'') wooden anchor
** 나모 닷 : 木椗 <漢淸文鑑> <ref>李洙 지음 (朝鮮 英祖 때의 譯官)</ref> <ref>南廣祐, 敎學古語辭典, 교학사, 1997, p. 376 </ref> <ref>徐廷範, 國語語源辭典, 보고사, 2001, p. 173 </ref>
